record.field: Replicate is a platform that makes it easy to run machine learning models in the cloud. It provides access to a wide variety of open source models and allows deployment of custom models.

{ "website": "https://replicate.com", "founded": 2019, "headquarters": "San Francisco, California", "key_features": [ "Model Deployment", "Open Source Models", "Cloud Inference", "Model Versioning" ] }
